Inline SVG Icons

Uses SVG symbol (info) to reduce multiple requests for vector imagery while avoiding pitfalls like missing-character artifacts. Icons inherit their color and size from the parent unless overtly resized.

  • filter
  • people-list
  • phone
  • picks
  • search
  • filter
  • video
  • audio
  • close
  • pause
  • warning
  • Alert
  • Alert circle
  • Chat
  • Return Call
  • Click 2 Call
  • PS Star
  • trash
